%% --- Korrekt link mellem Figur og Subfig ---
\newcounter{subfigcount}

% Denne linje tvinger referencen til at være "Figurnummer(Subbogstav)"
\renewcommand{\thesubfigcount}{\thefigure(\alph{subfigcount})}

\newcommand{\mysubcaption}[1]{%
    \vskip 0.5cm 
    \refstepcounter{subfigcount} % Gør tælleren aktiv for \label
    {\small \textbf{(\alph{subfigcount})} #1}% Vi skriver kun (a) under billedet
}

\setlength{\extrarowheight}{3pt}


\usepackage{environ}
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{10pt} % default er 6pt

\defineblockstyle{OnlyTitle}{
    titlewidthscale=1.0, bodywidthscale=1, titlecenter,
    titleoffsetx=0pt, titleoffsety=0pt, bodyoffsetx=0mm, bodyoffsety=0mm,
    bodyverticalshift=5mm, roundedcorners=0, linewidth=0pt,
    titleinnersep=0.5cm, bodyinnersep=0.5cm
}{
    \ifBlockHasTitle
        \draw[color=titlebgcolor, line width=5pt] 
            ($(blocktitle.south west)!0.1!(blocktitle.south east)$) -- 
            ($(blocktitle.south west)!0.9!(blocktitle.south east)$);
    \fi
}

\usepackage{caption}

\renewcommand{\thefigure}{(\alph{figure})}

\captionsetup[figure]{labelformat=empty}
